title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

Type of plant | Description (2 points; 1 point per description)

Autotrophic host plant

· Promoted germination

Obligate parasitic weed

· Inhibited germination

· Did not affect germination

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Support (1 point)

· Strigolactones promote germination (of the obligate parasitic weed)

Reasoning (1 point)

· Seeds only germinate when host plant/food source is present

· Seeds do not germinate when host plant/food source is not present
